fields.name: **Gunshot**:
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.0x Attack Power.

fields.name: **Power Shot** (x1, Charge 80%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.5x Attack Power.

fields.name: **Agender** (Passive):
fields.value: You have +0.3x Attack Power with Gunshot and Power Shot against players who don't use a set of pronouns you decide at the start of the game. You get this same bonus, stacking, against anyone with a gender.
